resources.string:
Example of using DrawerFrameLayout for the drawer.
This drawer has a custom max width of 250dp.

Check out the sample code on GitHub!

Example of using DrawerActivity for the drawer.
This drawer shows theming and has a custom Toolbar set.

Very simple ;)
